summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
The VMR_ASPECT_RATIO_MODE enumeration type describes whether the Video Mixing Renderer Filter 7 preserves the aspect ratio of the source video.

member.name: VMR_ASPECT_RATIO_MODE.VMR_ARMODE_NONE
member.summary: Indicates that the VMR will not try to maintain the aspect ratio of the source video.

member.name: VMR_ASPECT_RATIO_MODE.VMR_ARMODE_LETTER_BOX
member.summary: Indicates that the VMR will maintain the aspect ratio of the source video by letterboxing within the output rectangle.
